channel.title: How do I get a pic. to the web to share?
channel.description: Well I know you hit the print screen button on the keyboard than youpress ctrl+v but I forget were you put it so that you can save it as a pic and not a doc. Thats all I forgot though.

item.title: How do I get a pic. to the web to share?
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

No, you have to make it:

and not
[img http://mypic.imageshack.com /img]
Dont you know that,
solemage2?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get a pic. to the web to share?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Daniel1234:

I forget were you put it so that you can save it as a pic and not a doc

Not sure if you are wondering how to upload or save as a pic, but to save as a pic, go to start>programs>accessories>paint

THEN ctrl-V, and go to file>save, and save it as a jpg or whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get a pic. to the web to share?
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

ok first take the pick u got and save it anywhere. go to imageshack.us and click brouse and find it and click upload. then when its done highlight and copy the link called DIRECT LINK. then go to where ever y wanna post it. past the link to the post thingy

example: pretentd this is a link u copied
you need to ad at the end
[img http://jdflakjslfjas;lfjslfjimageshack.usjflsfjlfj /img]

thats it your done click post and walla!

My cool little tut
